citations.narrative:
The facility is operating a seasonal pumpkin patch which includes an exhibit featuring USDA regulated animals (a
dromedary camel and a watusi). A USDA official purchased a ticket and walked through the facility. The USDA official
then introduced themselves to the facility owner and stated that the facility needs a USDA license to exhibit animals such
as watusi and camels. The USDA official hand delivered the inspection report. A USDA license is required to exhibit
exotic animals including watusi and camels. No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Requirements and application. 
The facility is operating a seasonal pumpkin patch which includes an exhibit featuring USDA regulated animals (a 
dromedary camel and a watusi). A USDA official purchased a ticket and walked through the facility. The USDA official 
then introduced themselves to the facility owner and stated that the facility needs a USDA license to exhibit animals such 
as watusi and camels. The USDA official hand delivered the inspection report. A USDA license is required to exhibit 
exotic animals including watusi and camels. No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
